dataModel.description: Discussion of the assumptions and project design. Did the project implementation happen as it was planned/envisaged?
dataModel.name: assumptions

dataModel.description: Discussion on whether the project risks impacted the project outcomes, or whether the controls to mitigate them were acceptable.
dataModel.name: projectRiskManagement

dataModel.description: Description of other lessons learnt from the project and how they may be applied to other projects in the future.
dataModel.name: projectLessons

items.preLabel: ASSUMPTIONS - Did the project implementation happen as it was planned / envisaged?:
RISK MANAGEMENT - Discuss the effectiveness of your approach to managing project risks:
LESSONS - What other lessons did you or your organisation learn while undertaking this project?:
